name: EggBaby
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: egg baby
des:
Welcome to Egg Baby, the virtual parenting game! 

This is a game where you will be taking care of a baby that is represented by an egg. In order to make sure that your egg is happy, you need to check in on your baby at least every fourteen hours. If you leave your baby alone for longer than fourteen hours, your baby will die of boredom. See how long you can keep your baby happy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
